column4: As with most major OS versions, like Windows Vista,7 in order to install them you'd need to have a CD of sort
i wish to know though is it possible in ubuntu to upgrade without having the CD?
I want to install linux, but i have no 11.04 cd
what version of ubuntu do you have installed?
you could have Ubuntu in a virtual machine if you want?
you want to install ubuntu using Windows' boot manager?
no I mean how does the patch work
can you give me a link to the patch?
I'm using W7 64bit dual boot with Ubuntu
